channel.title: Health Analytics on Analytics by Vignesh
channel.description: Recent content in Health Analytics on Analytics by Vignesh

item.title: Building a Bodweight Tracker
item.description: Steps Create a google sheet Name sheet “Bodyweight Tracker” Create Shiny App You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.:19.0 3rd Qu.: 56.00 ## Max. :25.0 Max. :120.00 fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.
